title: ReduceLROnPlateau
body_html:
ReduceLROnPlateau is defined in lr_schedule but it is not pasted in init.py...so even after compiling new bleeading edge from github ...i could just see it but could not import it
dir(torch.optim.lr_schedule.ReduceLROnPlateau) works it shows the operations

import torch.optim.lr_schedule.ReduceLROnPlateau give import error
body_text:
ReduceLROnPlateau is defined in lr_schedule but it is not pasted in init.py...so even after compiling new bleeading edge from github ...i could just see it but could not import it

import torch.optim.lr_schedule.ReduceLROnPlateau give import error
body:
ReduceLROnPlateau is defined in lr_schedule but it is not pasted in __init__.py...so even after compiling new bleeading edge from github ...i could just see it but could not import it 
dir(torch.optim.lr_schedule.ReduceLROnPlateau) works it shows the operations 

import torch.optim.lr_schedule.ReduceLROnPlateau give import error
